title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Easy writing's vile hard reading.” —Richard Brinsley Sheridan (in Clio's Protest, 1795). [Submitted by H. Wendell Smith, Canyon Lake, Calif.]
